segments.text: This scene in the kitchen is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't see the water flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it could ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked if she steps wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, so innocent in her excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would notice and stop everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how everyday moments can turn dangerous so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids might get hurt, and she wouldn't even know.
segments.speaker: PAR
